blogs.title: Is Panama Safe?
blogs.body: There is a moderate crime rate in Panama. You will see a lot of police and armed security patrolling most areas. This can give you a feeling of safety, but there are certain measures you can take to stay safe in Panama.
blogs.bodyTwo: Being alert and planning your route ahead of time can help you look less like a target for muggers. Muggers (including pickpockets) are looking for people who are not paying attention to their surroundings, someone who looks lost, or indecisive. Walk confidently and with purpose and you will not be a muggers first choice. Muggers will size up a person's body language before making their move. They are looking for someone who walks or stands with a lazy droping posture. Walk with your head and eyes level and not looking at the ground. Not only will you project confidence, but you'll blend in as normal and not stand out as a target for a mugger.
